mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (status_id, arrival_time, created_at, user_id) VALUES ((SELECT status_id FROM statuses WHERE value = #{status}), #{arrivalTime}, now(), #{user.id});
mapper.select: SELECT order_id as "order_id", statuses.value as "order_status", arrival_time as "order_arrival_time", created_at as "order_created_at", finished_at as "order_finished_at", user_id as "user_id", name as "user_name" FROM orders JOIN statuses USING (status_id) JOIN users USING (user_id) WHERE order_id = #{orderId};
